name: Tapes of Old
description:
Our favorite childhood characters, Barney, Elmo, etc.  Aren't they wonderful?

Think again. In Tapes of Old, these and more come to haunt you. Demo available now!

(And just so you know this game is not an Amanda the Adventurer rip-off. This game started development before Amanda the Adventurer was released.)

All art by me. All sounds by me except menu music.

Menu music is Ghost of John (Bare Bones) version.
